The values are aligned left. If a value on the left is too long, the next value might be confused about whether or not both belong to the same column. You can either use shading or align each value in the center to distinguish each successive column.

Since a new website is currently being designed anyway, I will close this issue. It's quite unrelated to the actual mindsdb repository, so in the future we might want a different repo for issues related to the business website.
